Ink.summary: NOTE Experimental The Ink interface of the Ink API provides access to objects for the application to use to render ink strokes.

InkRequestPresenter.summary: NOTE Experimental The requestPresenter() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object to handle rendering strokes.
InkRequestPresenter.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves to a object instance.
